attributes.additional_details:
Now that the UK has more threats from within its society, than from outside.

The abolition of the crime of Treason removed any ability to bring to justice those who perpetrated acts contrary to the benefit of this country and its indigenous peoples. The abolition of the crime of Treason was in itself treasonous and those reponsible should be brought to book. The crime of Treason should be reinstated to deter any future actions which may further damage this country or its peoples.
